document: MEMORY CODES REVEALED BY RESPONSE LATENCIES by Lee Frederick DeCoster A dissertation submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy (Psychology) in The University of Michigan 1971 Doctoral Committee: Professor Irwin Pollack, Chairman Professor Wilfred M. Kincaid Professor Arthur W. Melton Professor Daniel J. Weintraub Dr. Sylvan Kornblum, Mental Health Research Institute
